thread.title: Two missing after flash flooding in Virginia

title: Two missing after flash flooding in Virginia
text:
Two missing after flash flooding in Virginia 11:22am EDT - 01:15
Albemarle County Fire Chief Dan Eggleston said Thursday that authorities are still searching for two people who went missing after flash flooding in Virginia and that their vehicle was found. Officials said a third person in Madison County was also missing. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
Albemarle County Fire Chief Dan Eggleston said Thursday that authorities are still searching for two people who went missing after flash flooding in Virginia and that their vehicle was found. Officials said a third person in Madison County was also missing. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). //reut.rs/2H8XwsH
